StrategyDescription: Breakout strategy that trades when price breaks the previous week's high or low, with trend filter confirmation

TrendFilter.Period.Name: TrendFilter.Period
TrendFilter.Period.Description: Period for the trend filter indicator (SMA or EMA)

TrendFilter.Type.Name: TrendFilter.Type
TrendFilter.Type.Description: Type of moving average to use for trend filtering

StopLoss.Method.Name: StopLoss.Method
StopLoss.Method.Description: Method for calculating stop-loss (Percentage or ATR-based)

StopLoss.Percentage.Name: StopLoss.Percentage
StopLoss.Percentage.Description: Stop-loss percentage when using Percentage method

StopLoss.ATRMultiplier.Name: StopLoss.ATRMultiplier
StopLoss.ATRMultiplier.Description: ATR multiplier for stop-loss when using ATR method

ATR.Period.Name: ATR.Period
ATR.Period.Description: Period for Average True Range (ATR) indicator

TakeProfit.Percentage.Name: TakeProfit.Percentage
TakeProfit.Percentage.Description: Take-profit percentage when using Percentage method

TakeProfit.ATRMultiplier.Name: TakeProfit.ATRMultiplier
TakeProfit.ATRMultiplier.Description: ATR multiplier for take-profit when using ATR method

TakeProfit.RiskRewardRatio.Name: TakeProfit.RiskRewardRatio
TakeProfit.RiskRewardRatio.Description: Risk-to-reward ratio when using RiskReward method for take-profit

PositionSizing.FixedSize.Name: PositionSizing.FixedSize
PositionSizing.FixedSize.Description: Fixed position size when using Fixed sizing method

PositionSizing.EquityPercent.Name: PositionSizing.EquityPercent
PositionSizing.EquityPercent.Description: Percentage of equity to risk per trade (used by PercentOfEquity and ATRBased methods)

PositionSizing.ATRMultiplier.Name: PositionSizing.ATRMultiplier
PositionSizing.ATRMultiplier.Description: ATR multiplier for position sizing when using ATRBased method
